heading: my portfolio
description:
The project where I get the chance to show my qualities, interests and a piece of my personality.

Technologies:
HTML, CSS, Sass, JavaScript, Clamp, ITCSS & BEMIT - working with @use and @forward since @import is about to be depricated. Wireframes made with Figma.

heading: sean connery quiz
description: The Sean Connery Character Quotes Quiz, is a JavaScript project consisting of an interactive web application made with HTML, CSS, Bootstrap And JavaScript. The JavaScript is based on a quiz tutorial by James Q Quick. I made the design with the aid of Balsamiq wireframe tool. The application is fully resposive on all devices, and got excellent test results for SEO and accessibility.

heading: gaffer's dock
description: Gaffer’s Dock, the very first website by my own design, developed after only four weeks of studying HTML, CSS and Bootstrap at Code Institute. Yet, it is fully responsive and functional throughout all devices. The project includes an extensive README.md file, and wireframes made in Balsamiq.

heading: bhromaon
description: Bhromaon, a coding challenge to recreate the design of a static website from a Figma desktop wireframe. Making it fully responsive on all devices. Tablet and mobile design free of choice. For this assignment I have used HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and Sass, being mindfull of semantics and accessability.

heading: emoji mischief
description: Emoji mischief, a mini project envolving the task of coding svg-images in XML from wireframes and animate them with CSS.

heading: movie theatre logo
description:
Figma design for logo, navbar and, footer for a fictitious movie theatre website. The design was created as a wireframe for a group assignment in the IT-Programming course at Sundsgården's Folk Highschool.

In the design process, I used tools as Auto layout, Arc Plugin and, Font Awesome. The Federo font, together with the earth-tone hues in the colour palette, was chosen to spark the feeling of the early 20th-century.
